note.p: Scottish farmer. Of Fanellan, about one mile west of Beaufort Castle in Inverness-shire, the ancestral seat of the Lovats, in 1871, 1881. Son of William Lawson and his wife May Wilson of Tullynessle, Aberdeenshire.
Census returns of Scotland 1871 (The National Archives of Scotland: Kiltarlity 5/6), 1881 (Kiltarlity 5/1)
Scotland, national probate index (calendar of confirmations and inventories), 1876–1936 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 5 December 2019)
Scotland, select births and baptisms, 1564–1950 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 5 December 2019)
